page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: The block covers part of { {Stockton-on-Tees,}most of{Thornaby and the{Whinney Banks}area of Middlesbrough.Stockton is separated from Thornaby by the River Tees.The area around Stockton High Street is in the north-western section of the block.There is an industrial estate to the south of the residential area of Stockton. Across the river from Stockton is an industrial site and the Tees Marshalling Yard. South of the A66 are the main sporting facilities including Stockton Racecourse,the golf club,a cricket ground,and Hustler Playing Fields. Thornaby is separated from Middlesbrough by the old River Tees which was part of the main river until the{River Tees}was straightened over 150 years ago. The A19,which runs north south,marks a clearer boundary between the two towns.
